long_description: 1 traffic control specialists in southern colorado. our main branch is located in pueblo, co with a 2nd branch in colorado springs, co. southern colorado's #1 choice for traffic control services, sign installation and manufacturing. a-1 barricade & sign, inc . has been providing traffic control services and sign installation since 1976. a-1 barricade & sign, inc. offers our clients a large selection of services. from major cdot highway project to small street closures for city utility work. contact a-1 barricade & sign, inc. to learn more about our safety products. we're here to help, please don't hesitate to reach out. for over 40+ years , a-1 barricade & sign, inc . has been dedicated to the traffic control needs of southern colorado , providing only exceptional service and high quality products. we have been family owned and operating from the beginning and enjoy gaining new business and personal relationships with our customers.
